title: SSP Shoaib reviews duty points, urges officers to uphold public safety
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP):Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP) Operations Muhammad Shoaib Khan on Tuesday visited various duty points across the city to review police deployment and performance.
An official told APP that the visit was aimed at encouraging on-duty officers and ensuring they perform their responsibilities with diligence, integrity, and professionalism. Other senior police officers also accompanied the SSP during the visit.
He said that all officers must check duty points in their respective areas personally and carry out their duties with honesty and dedication. “We are all responsible for protecting the lives and property of this city and its residents,” he emphasized.
He said that officers must demonstrate courteous behavior while dealing with the public. “It is our duty to instill a sense of safety among the citizens,” he added.
He said the protection of citizens’ lives and property and the control of crime remain the foremost priorities of the Islamabad Police.
